thread.section_title: Gullei 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Gullei 的点评意见 | gullei.com
thread.title: Natalie Martinkova
thread.title_full: Gullei 的点评人 Natalie Martinkova

author: Natalie Martinkova
title: Natalie Martinkova
text: Honestly after i made my order i was a bit fishy as ive never heard about this company and juat came across them online. I found very bad reviews online about it taking months to arrive etc so was very worried that id be scammed even! However those worries were unnecessary . I just recieved the rings , within the delivery range of days. They are very pretty and have the names inside as i chose. I love them. Im a satisfied customer. If you find ringa you like on here, they come as they look.
